title: Surprise Party Fiddlesticks missing party hat on HUD ulti icon
body:
_Ignore the old icons - those aren't the point._
Default R icon:
https://youtu.be/uc_-ms5ADhk?t=57

Surprise party exclusive R icon:
_The crow on the R-icon used to have a party hat. Now it's gone._
http://apollo-pbe-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1407667365344/fiddleicons.png

https://youtu.be/vV4Xd5mKxJQ?t=19

Not a big deal, and certainly no gamebreaker, but still - in the spirit of Surprise Party Fiddlesticks used to have special icons (also, who doesn't prefer their crows to have party hats?), I'd like to see it reinstated for the skin.

replies.body:
Hey PaladinNO, 

Thanks for the report! I'm not sure where this icon may have gone to, but I'll look around for it and see what happened! :)

I sure appreciate that, sir/ma'am. :)

The icons are just a little detail ofc., but the Surprise Party Fiddlesticks skin is just hilarous to use, and deserve all the "lol!" it can get.
